text.div:
Codes for Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU) Summary Data

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/terminology/codesystem/cdcnhsn.html
    Code Display
    1333-4 Number of episodes of mechanical ventilation (EMV) days
    1851-5 Number of patient days
    1852-3 Number of ventilator days
    1853-1 Number of urinary catheter days
    1854-9 Number of central line days including umbilical catheter

name: Codes for Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU) Summary Data

concept.display: Number of episodes of mechanical ventilation (EMV) days
Number of central line days including umbilical catheter
